goals__remit:
Greenyard (Euronext Brussels: GREEN) is a global market leader in fresh and prepared fruit & vegetables, as well as growing media. Greenyard has operations worldwide and serves a global customer base including most of the leading retailers in Europe. 
The Group counts more than 9,000 employees active in 26 countries worldwide, with a turnover of 4.2 billion EUR in the fiscal year ending on 31 March 2017.
